item.title: Portfolio
item.description: Welcome to my Portfolio. Below you will find years of Creative and Technical work proudly accomplished by me.

item.title: It's About Time!
item.description: You've all heard the rumors... and yes! It's true! I now have my very own About page. This is the culmination of many skills I've learned in only the past few weeks and I'm excited to finally share it with all of you! Anyways, I'm going to catch up on the three nights of sleep I skipped to get this out by today. –Christian Trussler

item.title: Fresh Starts
item.description: Another year has passed and here we are again! Unless you’re a baby… then happy first new year! You must be a genius to be reading before you’re even one. This year I plan to make a lot of changes in my daily schedule. Writing these posts is one of them and I welcome you all to join me on my journey of learning and adventure! What are some things you plan on in the new year?

item.title: About
item.description: This Is Only The Beginning.. Christian Trussler has been passionately producing content since the age of seven. With an ever-expanding roster of skills and talents including Copywrite, Design, and Editing, he is ready to tackle any project. Stay up to date with my work right here or check out the links below to have the latest updates and content sent directly to your brain.
